name: Spiderweb Sonnet (WIP)
description:
Greeting, stranger! 

It is a short visual novel about a certain  poet, who is forced to make difficult decisions on his way to a well-deserved dinner.

TRIGGER WARNING:

This game is absurd and silly. I didn't make her with a straight face. Nevertheless, it does contain potentally disturbing images and ideas. Murderous spiders, consumption of human flesh, use of syringes. rude language and bad poetry.

The game was created by me, Gargoolia, for the #123 Mini Jam.

Backgrounds were made by Midjourey neural network. Music and sounds (well, SOUND) were taken from public domain resources. 

Everything else  ( texts, poems, character sprites, additional images and final illustrations) is made by me. 

I didn't have enought time to finish the game properly. It is fully playable and has 3 endings. Although, the "baby" ending is lacking proper texts. I will fix everything soon. Thank you for understanding!
